Name: Display of current vehicle registration.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the display of current vehicle registration.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Subchapter 2 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-167 to read as follows:
19-167  Vehicle registration.  No person shall stand or park a vehicle bearing a New York license plate or plates unless it properly displays a current registration sticker or other official proof issued by the department of motor vehicles that indicates that vehicle registration for such vehicle is current.  
Â§2.  This local law shall take effect immediately after its enactment into law.  
      
RR
Int. 549/2005
